name: VOICE2insight
tagline: Using the Latest In Voice Technologies
description:
Voice2insight is a service provided by Prototyping Management Corporation (PMC). Founded in 1994 to assist organizations with their strategic development, Voice2insight is the industry’s only provider of Mobile Dictation Sales Enablement Solutions for Customer Relationship Management (CRM) systems.
Voice2insight’s Mobile Dictation Solutions and On-Demand Sales Enablement platform maximizes the sales organization’s ability to communicate client, competitive and market information in an easy, clear, consistent and compelling way - simply by talking.
Voice2insight solutions integrate with various CRM platforms combining proven sales and marketing best practices with award-winning Mobile Dictation technology. Voice2insight addresses the primary aspects of the Sales Enablement challenge— maximizing productivity while capturing and recording client, competitive and market insights.
Today, our team of skilled technical and management leaders is poised to change the way organizations communicate customer information and make strategic decisions.
